schema.title: Custom validation
schema.description: This form defines custom validation rules checking that the two passwords match.

taxResidenceInformation.description: Please indicate (i) the country where you are resident for tax purposes and (ii) your Taxpayer Identifi cation Number or functional equivalent (hereafter referred to as ‘TIN’) for each country indicated. If you are a resident for tax purposes in more than three countries, please use a separate sheet. If a TIN is unavailable please provide reason A, B, or C where appropriate: • Reason A: The country where you are resident does not issue TINs to its residents • Reason B: You are otherwise unable to obtain a TIN (please explain why you are unable to obtain a TIN in the below table if you have selected this reason) • Reason C: No TIN is required (note: only select this reason if the authorities of the country of residence for tax purposes entered below do not require the TIN to be disclosed)
taxResidenceInformation.title: Tax Residence Information

mainApplicant.title: Main Appicant
mainApplicant.description: *Where your Country of Tax Residence is Singapore, your Tax Identifi cation Number (TIN) is either your “NRIC” or your “FIN” as relevant.

countryofResidenceforTaxPurpose.title: Country of Residence for Tax Purpose

noTIN.title: If no TIN is available, enter Reason A, B, or C

section2.title: SECTION 2: ALL SOURCES OF GROSS MONTHLY INCOME EARNED IN THE LAST 12 MONTHS
section2.description: Please submit documents providing details of the source(s) of income selected below (including your latest available statements from the CPF Board and IRAS in addition to any other documents)

enum: Fixed and variable income (e.g. salary and commission)
Variable income (e.g. commission, bonus, allowance or business)

section3.description: Please submit documents (including your latest available statements from the CPF Board and IRAS in addition to any other documents) providing details of the source(s) of income selected below, details of your current employment and monthly income.
section3.title: SECTION 3: EMPLOYMENT AND INCOME INFORMATION

ownershipofCompany.title: Is ownership of Company more than 10%?

previousEmployer_CompanyName.title: Previous Employer/ Company Name
previousEmployer_CompanyName.description: Required if current employment is less than one year
previousEmployer_CompanyName.validationMsg: Must be filled if Length Of Service (Years) < 1 year

year.validationMsg: Must be filled if Length Of Service (Years) < 1 year

months.validationMsg: Must be filled if Length Of Service (Years) < 1 year

section4.title: SECTION 4: RELEVANT CREDIT FACILTIES (as defined in Section 9 (Declaration))
section4.description: Please fill up details of all of your Relevant Credit Facilities (including (a) Relevant Credit Facilities that have been disbursed but not fully repaid, (b) Relevant Credit Facilities that have not been disbursed, and (c) applications for Relevant Credit Facilities that are pending approval) in this Section, and submit documents providing details of these Relevant Credit Facilities. Lender includes the Housing Development Board, any fi nancial institution, licensed moneylender, vendor of residential property, or any other party/source from whom you obtained any fi nancing /with whom you enter into a hire-purchase arrangement. If there is insuffi cient space in this section, please photocopy this Section and attach it as part of this application form.

facilityType.description: For Mortgage Property (set out in Section 5), whether granted to you or to any other party:
For any other property located in or outside Singapore:

anyOtherCreditFacility.title: Any Other Credit Facility (including Personal Guarantee)

section5.title: SECTION 5: DETAILS OF MORTGAGE PROPERTY (For which mortgage facility is being sought)

LandArea_Sq_ft_.title: Land Area
LandArea_Sq_ft_.description: For commercial/industrial property with residential element (e.g.shophouse):

othersPurpose.title: Including for the benefit of any other party. Please state:

receivedanydiscounts.description: In relation to fi nancing of Mortgage Property, have you or any other person received any discounts, rebates, benefi ts, vouchers, subsidies, and/or incentives (including the payment of legal or stamp fees), which has the effect of reducing the true purchase price of the Mortgage Property, from any party?

enum: Furniture & Electrical Rebates/Stamp Duty Rebates/Cash Rebates/Vouchers
Benefi ts from deferred payment scheme
